sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>cmdb_model</collection> <condition>(current.model_number.changes() || current.cost.changes() || current.description.changes() || current.short_description.changes() || current.picture.changes()) && !current.product_catalog_item.nil()</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Sync to Product catalog item</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[if (current.sys_class_name == 'cmdb_hardware_product_model' || current.sys_class_name == 'cmdb_consumable_product_model') (new ProductCatalogUtils()).updateProductCatalog(current, 'model', 'pc_hardware_cat_item'); else if (current.sys_class_name == 'cmdb_software_product_model') (new ProductCatalogUtils()).updateProductCatalog(current, 'model', 'pc_software_cat_item'); else if ((GlideDBObjectManager.get().getBase(current.getTableName()) != 'cmdb_serviceorder_product_model') && (GlideDBObjectManager.get().getBase(current.getTableName()) != 'cmdb_servicetask_product_model')) (new ProductCatalogUtils()).updateProductCatalog(current, 'model', 'pc_product_cat_item');]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2012-09-29 03:06:07</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>055749c537303000158bbfc8bcbe5db8</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Sync to Product catalog item</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Product Catalog" source="com.snc.product_catalog">4118f8ec3cb1311068bcf327dfe37fd0</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_055749c537303000158bbfc8bcbe5db8</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2015-03-17 19:13:28</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=055749c537303000158bbfc8bcbe5db8"/> </record_update>
